io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.endpoints.authorization

Class AuthenticationRequestAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.endpoints.authorization.AuthenticationRequestAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationRequest, AuthorizationEndpointRequestConfiguration

    public class AuthenticationRequestAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthenticationRequest
    Provides an AuthenticationRequest by combining OauthConfiguration, StateProvider, NonceProvider, AuthorizationEndpointConfiguration.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo

      • getIdTokenHint

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getIdTokenHint()
        Specified by:
        getIdTokenHint in interface AuthenticationRequest
        Returns:
        Token previously issued by the Authorization Server being passed as a hint about the End-User's current or past authenticated session with the Client. If the End-User identified by the ID Token is logged in or is logged in by the request, then the Authorization Server returns a positive response; otherwise, it SHOULD return an error, such as login_required.

      • getLoginHint

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getLoginHint()
        Specified by:
        getLoginHint in interface AuthenticationRequest
        Returns:
        Hint to the Authorization Server about the login identifier the End-User might use to log in.
